bill.title: Information Technology [WPSC]
bill.description: Revises the duties and responsibilities of the Agency for Enterprise Information Technology. Requires that the agency develop standards for information technology services. Specifies the contents of financial statements that must be provided by primary data centers. Requires that each data center submit to its board of trustees cost-reduction proposals and organizational plans, etc. APPROPRIATION: $300,000.
